tableau_usage.sales_extract: Connect as data source for sales dashboards. Grain: line item level.
tableau_usage.inventory_extract: Connect for inventory health dashboards. Grain: product-warehouse level.
tableau_usage.supplier_extract: Connect for supplier scorecard. Grain: supplier level.
tableau_usage.timeseries_extract: Connect for trend analysis. Grain: daily by warehouse/category.

recommended_relationships: Link supplier to inventory via product-supplier mapping
Use timeseries for trend lines and forecasting
